snippet.title: Witchcrafter: Empire legends - first gameplay teaser
snippet.description:
Witchcrafter: Empire Legends is a gripping platformer RPG/metroidvania with a strong emphasis on a dark fantasy story, fulfilled with vivid characters with own motives and experiences, set in the world full of elemental magic.

It's a first gameplay teaser of my indie game under development, so if you are enjoying it, follow me! ;)

Twitter https://twitter.com/WitchcrafterRPG
Discord https://discordapp.com/invite/yWA4Rek
Reddit https://www.reddit.com/user/PabloTitan21
Devlog https://forum.defold.com/t/witchcrafter-empire-legends/32285

Support me and get the game on:

Ko-Fi https://ko-fi.com/paweljarosz
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/pawel_jarosz


Have a great day!
Paweł
